#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#define MAX 100000
#define M 1000000007
#define scll(t) scanf("%lld",&t)
#define scl(t) scanf("%ld",&t)
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define ll long long
using namespace std;


int main()
{

    long t,i;
    scl(t);
    while(t--){


    long n,r1,r2,q,a,b;
    scl(n);
    long h=n;
    vector<long> deg1(n),deg2(n);
    deg1.clear();
    deg2.clear();
    deg1.resize(n);
    deg2.resize(n);
    scl(r1);
    n--;
    long n2=n;
    while(n--)
    {
        scl(a);
        scl(b);
        ++deg1[a];
        ++deg1[b];
    }
    scl(r2);

        while(n2--)
        {
        scl(a);
        scl(b);
        ++deg2[a];
        ++deg2[b];
        }
        if(deg1[r1]!=deg2[r2])
        printf("0\n");
    else{
    sort(deg1.begin(),deg1.end());
    sort(deg2.begin(),deg2.end());


    for(i=0;i<h;i++)
        if(deg1[i]!=deg2[i])
            break;
    if(i==h)
        printf("1\n");
    else
        printf("0\n");
    }}
    return 0;
}
